title: Cervidae antlers exploited to manufacture prehistoric tools and hunting implements as a reliable source of ancient DNA
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): José-Miguel Tejero, Olivia Cheronet, Pere Gelabert, Brina Zagorc, Esteban Álvarez-Fernández, Pablo Arias, Aline Averbouh, Guy Bar-Oz, Omry Barzilai, Anna Belfer-Cohen, Marjolein D.
